short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lumi Lens is your eye care companion. Reduce eye strain at night with an amber screen tint.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lumi Lens is your eye care companion. Reduce eye strain at night with this extension. Lumi Lens protects your eyes by tinting your browser's screen amber. This makes it easier for you to read, watch videos, and general browsing in dim, warm yet comfortable light.

Quick Keyboard Shortcuts:
Windows & Linux - Ctrl+Shift+E
Mac - Command+Shift+E
